text: Anyone tried integrating tailwind with js_modules?

Yup, some: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04AY1H2204/p1673036495424399>

We’re hoping to push and let the beta group know about some related changes Real Soon Now:tm:… but for now you should be able to include tailwind in your “cms-assets” package.json and try things locally. Here’s an example of the <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-blocks-hello-world/compare/tf/try-tailwind|hello world repo with some small Tailwind additions>
<@UV23JHEJY> yea, I have tailwind up and running. Let me know if you have any questions
